item.title: Last.fm user analysis
item.description: Motivation This was a university project for the Architectures for Big Data course. The goal is to collect data, in particular user listenings from Last.fm, store it somewhere, in this case on cloud, and find interesting statistics using Spark, for instance top song per day, week, month, top playlists, and so on. The code is written in Python and can be found here. Data collection The first part is to collect data, Last.
